title: Plastic Ocean Livestream - FuseSchool & Incredible Oceans

media:group.media:title: Plastic Ocean Livestream - FuseSchool & Incredible Oceans
media:group.media:description:
Join marine biologists Dr Russell Arnott and Pavan Virdee, as they explore the problems and solutions surrounding the sometimes overwhelming issue of ocean plastic.

Where does this plastic come from? What is it doing to the marine environment and the creatures within it? What are the potential solutions to this problem? And what can YOU do about it?!
